title: Inglourious Basterds
author: timbob™

comments.content:
Font used for names on Inglourious Basterds poster?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/basterds_6223.png)

Appears to be Enschede Heavy:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/enschede/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162914/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/enschede/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/enschede/")

Strange, because the movie title is set in Egyptienne Bold Extended:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/egyptienne/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162914/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/egyptienne/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/egyptienne/")
